sentences.en: A continental climate is different from an insular one.
sentences.cn: 大陆性气候不同于岛屿气候.
受欢迎的欧洲大陆度假胜地

sentences.en: Both sides adopted the Continental style of play.
sentences.cn: 双方都采用了欧陆式打法。

sentences.en: Brazil's endowment of natural resources matches its " Continental " dimensions .
sentences.cn: 巴西的丰富资源和它那广大的 幅员 很相称.

sentences.en: Chains of saline lakes are found in places in continental interiors.
sentences.cn: 在大陆内部的某些地区发现了盐湖系列.

sentences.en: El Salvador has earned the dubious distinction of having the worst soil erosion in continental America.
sentences.cn: 萨尔瓦多因是美洲大陆土壤侵蚀最严重的地方而有了这份不光彩的名声。

sentences.en: He sees no signs of improvement in the UK and continental economy.
sentences.cn: 他看不到英国与欧洲大陆经济好转的迹象。

sentences.en: Housing finance is less developed in continental Europe.
sentences.cn: 住房金融业在欧洲大陆的发展程度较低。

sentences.en: In the east, they have a dry continental climate with severe winters.
sentences.cn: 他们东边是干燥的大陆性气候,冬季严寒.

sentences.en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 海平面下降使白令海底部的浅层大陆架暴露出来。

sentences.en: The coarse sediments have generally accumulated along the continental margins.
sentences.cn: 粗粒沉积物一般沿大陆边缘堆积.

sentences.en: The continental beds are as thick as their marine time equivalents.
sentences.cn: 陆相地层与其时代相同的海相地层具有一样的厚度.

sentences.en: The most ancient parts of the continental crust are 4000 million years old.
sentences.cn: 大陆地壳最古老的部分有40亿年历史。
无可否认，托基具有典型的欧陆风情。

phrases.tran_cn: 欧式早餐（仅有咖啡和果酱面包）
美国大陆洛矶山脉分水岭
不活动大陆边缘，被动大陆边缘

trans.tran_cn: 大洲的，大陆的，（除英国之外）欧洲大陆的，美洲大陆的
trans.tran_en: relating to a large mass of land
